titleInfo.title: Robustness of intermediate agreements for the Discrete Raiffa solution

mods.abstract: First via a counter example it is shown that the Proposition 3 of Anbarci & Sun (2013) is false. Then a gap and a mistake in their proof are identified. Finally, a modified version of their Proposition 3 is stated and proved.
